member.name: M:DHI.Res1DReader.Res1DData.Sum
member.summary: Sum all time series values in Res1DData.

member.name: T:DHI.Res1DReader.Res1DQuery
member.summary: Create query for specific quantity in res1d file.

member.name: T:DHI.Res1DReader.Res1DReader
member.summary: Class for extracting and resampling multiple res1D-file time series. Resamples all results if samplingPeriodMinutes > 0 in constructor. Uses first loaded res1d file to set start time.

member.name: P:DHI.Res1DReader.Res1DReader.Res1DFileKeySamplingReference
member.summary: The sampling reference sets the target resampling for all other res1d files.

member.summary: Load multiple res1d files and set first res1d-file as sampling reference.
